column4: Hello! It's my first time using Unity....    Does anyone know if there is a way that i can change the order that icons appear on the "Dash Panel" (The panel on the left of the screen)
i would like to customize the order the icons appear from top to bottom.
you can drag & drop them, use MyUnity to change the look of the panel
Thanks! I feel like an idiot now! it works though.  thanks again.
